channel.title: Comments on: Mexico: the Rug Hook Project

item.title: By: Jackie Marchbank
item.dc:creator: Jackie Marchbank
item.description: I was interested to read Anne's article. In 2006, I met with Charlotte Bell and all the rug hooking ladies of Augustin Gonzales. Our rug hooking group in Rocky Mountain House put together loads of fabric/strips for me to take to Mexico. Had a great visit meeting all the Mexican rug hookers and seeing what great rugs they had worked on, even bought a couple to bring home.
item.content:encoded: I was interested to read Anne’s article. In 2006, I met with Charlotte Bell and all the rug hooking ladies of Augustin Gonzales. Our rug hooking group in Rocky Mountain House put together loads of fabric/strips for me to take to Mexico. Had a great visit meeting all the Mexican rug hookers and seeing what great rugs they had worked on, even bought a couple to bring home.
